overview: Recorded in Theatre de Fontainebleau. The story is about three high school friends in their forties who meet regularly for dinner. One evening, a fourth person is invited, the girl with whom all three were in love in high school. Then begins a part of the Game of Truth where indiscreet questions, sharp spikes and revelations come together.  The piece is published by Art & Comedy (2007) and released on DVD.
title: Le Jeu de la vérité
